definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Mr. Freed has also cut water use by installing ultra-low-flow shower heads.
sentences.chinese: 弗瑞德先生也安装了超低流量的花洒省水。

sentences.english: I get a small chair to sit in front of the shower, is the head of the rubber band solution.
sentences.chinese: 我拿一个小椅子坐在花洒的前面，正解着头上的橡筋。

sentences.english: First, measure the water consumption of your current showerhead.
sentences.chinese: 首先，测量你目前使用的花洒的用水量。

sentences.english: Install a low-flow showerhead if you do not already have one.
sentences.chinese: 安装低流量花洒如果你不已经有一个。

sentences.english: Then, put the bucket under the shower and run the water for exactly one minute.
sentences.chinese: 然后把桶放在花洒下，让花洒喷水一分钟整。

sentences.english: The shower is the only place where you can use the shower head as a sex toy.
sentences.chinese: 浴室是唯一一个你可以把花洒当做性趣用品的地方。

definition: drain/underground drainpipe/floor gutter/25th of 2nd lunar month
chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
